summary: The Kinks were an English rock band formed in 1963 by brothers Ray and Dave Davies. They were very popular in the 1960s and are still remembered for their hits like "You Really Got Me" and "Lola". Their music was inspired by many styles, and they sang about English life. The band had many members over the years but lasted until 1997. They were very successful, selling over 50 million records and being inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
title: The Kinks
